reviewText: If your even faintly familiar with Deacon Blue or only know their first largely ignored masterpiece "Raintown" This DVD is a definitive collection of video and live material that represents everything passionate about these Glasgow pop wizards. The Live material from a 1989 concert on their home turf is magical, empowered with the energy to move and the melodies to stir the heart. A great great band that not only write and perform their original masterpices but touch moments of Randy Newman's "Sail Away", Spooner Oldham's "Dark End of the Street". Do yourself a favor and pick up a copy of this great DVD and share it with as many friends as possible.....................
